short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of PrairieLearn and PrairieTest!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a new section to the top of the home page and each course page in PrairieLearn with all of the upcoming assessments and due dates sorted in chronological order to keep you on track without having to scroll through the entire list to find them.
